index.title: Surgery and Anesthesia Conference | Meetings | Events | Germany | 2026
index.content: Discover the rearmost in Surgery and Anesthesia exploration and treatment at our comprehensive Surgery and Anesthesia Conference during September 23-24, 2026 in Berlin, Germany. Join experts in exploring slice- edge curatives, technological advancements, and holistic approaches to managing Surgery and Anesthesia effectively. Register now to secure your place at the van of Surgery and Anesthesia invention.
